text: is a Japanese museum ship. It is permanently docked at Yokohama harbor.Yokohama Visitors Guide, Nippon Maru . Retrieved 2012-6-28. ==History== Nippon Maru was built in Kobe in 1930. It was a training ship for the cadets of the Japanese merchant marine.Tokyo Guidebook, Yokohama Maritime Museum. Retrieved 2012-6-28. The ship became a museum in 1984. ==References== ==Other websites== * Yokohama Maritime Museum Category:Museums in Japan Category:Yokohama
title: Nippon Maru
